The bug is actually a developer block against cracking, we'll just wait for an update/fix from "SKIDROW" probably not too long I'm guessing, the gameplay is not bad, no bugs in it so far, I find it free of choice how to defeat the monsters, powers are interesting, it's like Kratos and that other playstation title where a woman is lead character had a baby together, this would have to be it, thanks for uploading and thank you "SKIDROW" for cracking.

Nothing wrong with Crack.. Badly developed game..Steam has withdrawn the game, yes. Like dead Island, and force unleashed, the bugs are fixable,but only by the company who wrote the game..

My game runs without problems, but i got stuck in the part after when you press the button to open the big gate. To get out i should open the door with the rotating mechanism, but i press E and then proceed to press LMB repeatedly as usual but no matter how i do it, it just drops the door at the end. 

I just tested again with a controller but no matter what, the door gears start opening and drop at the end, similar to when you stop pressing the button (which i don’t).

Dammit i should read the comments before posting, so it seems other have the door problem too. I was just looking if someone else had that problem and if it was a crack problem, but now i know. 

So it seems a developer problem, i'm really surprised how a game breaking bug like this one ended up in the game after release.
thank u a lot for the game plz do upload binary domain :)  extremezone u rock
Ya, is confirmed dev bug, tehy say is gonan be fixed in 48h.

Same here door "bug". Nice gameplay, hope SKIDROW fix it soon. Same problems report in other forums like GAMESPOT.  This was an answer from YUPLAY Digital Store :


Wrong version of Blades of Time in Steam‏

Ivan Rybalko

Add to contacts
Good afternoon,

There was a totally unexpected confusion with the Blades of Time distribution files, currently available in Steam, which are of an old version, most likely to be stuck during the first level.

Therefore its keys were removed from the shop for selling and will be added as soon as the problem is solved. The correct version should be available with an update coming during 24 hours.

We apologize for the caused troubles and hope for understanding.
-- 
Best regards, Ivan
YUPLAY Digital Store

sunerster..  you need to go to the settings of the graphics card in your case the catalyst control center and check the box that says "use application settings" in SMOOTHVISION HD: Anti-Aliasing ... which means you can not overwrite the settings of the game in the graphics card (or at least anti-aliasing only I think) .. to activate anti-aliasing you must do it from the game options in the game ... sorry for my prehistoric and bad English :-)
